headline.main: Peanut Butter Substitute Recalled After E. Coli Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Peanut Butter Substitute Recalled After E. Coli Outbreak

lead_paragraph: A peanut butter substitute sold by an Illinois company is being recalled because 12 cases of E. coli have been linked to the product.
snippet: A peanut butter substitute sold by an Illinois company is being recalled because 12 cases of E. coli have been linked to the product....
